report.name: 2010 Budget By Department
report.command: SELECT D.Name, B.Amount, CONVERT(varchar,CONVERT(decimal(8,1),B.Amount/1000))+'k' Thousands FROM {oq}DNNStuff_SQLViewPro_Sample_Departments D INNER JOIN {oq}DNNStuff_SQLViewPro_Sample_Budgets B ON D.DepartmentId = B.DepartmentId WHERE B.Year = 2010
report.config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><Settings xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><TemplateText><img src="http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chs=700x300&amp;chd=t:[EACHROW][Amount],[/EACHROW]0&amp;cht=p3&amp;chl=[EACHROW][Name] ($[Thousands])|[/EACHROW]&amp;chtt=2010+Budget+Allocation+By+Department&amp;chts=FF0000,20&amp;chco=FF0000,FF8040,FFFF00,00FF00,00FFFF,0000FF,800080" alt="2010 Budget Allocation By Department" /> </TemplateText></Settings>
